channel.title: Pages on kubuzetto's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on kubuzetto's blog

item.title: Devrim Åžahin (kubuzetto)
item.description:
35-year-old staff software engineer serving code the old-fashioned way. Currently working in Picus Security.

You can contact me at: LinkedIn | GitHub

This blog mostly contains my opinionated ramblings and personal experiments led by boredom while serving no practical purposes.
